Header: “Vada Chennai” slated to be released in September
Content: “Vada Chennai” is an upcoming Indian Tamil-language film written and directed by Vetrimaran. This movie tells about 35 years of people’s life in North chennai. Produced as a trilogy by A. Subaskaran’s Lyca Productions and Dhanush’s Wunderbar Films with Vetrimaran’s Grass Root Film Company, it features Dhanush in the lead role with Samuthirakani, Aishwarya Rajesh and Andrea Jeremiah in other key roles. The movie which has high expectations from the large fanbase of Dhanush is slated to be released in September 2018.
